impulse noun

C2 [ C + to infinitive ] a sudden strong wish to do something: impulse to I had this sudden impulse to shout out "Nonsense!" in the middle of her speech. on (an) impulse
C2 because you suddenly want to, although you haven't planned to: "I didn't know you were looking for some new shoes." "Oh, I wasn't - I just bought them on impulse."
